title: Veselka: The Rainbow on the Corner at the Center of the World
overview: New York City's beloved Ukrainian restaurant Veselka is best known for its borscht and varenyky, but it has become a beacon of hope for Ukraine. As the second-generation owner Tom Birchard reluctantly retires after 54 years, his son Jason faces the pressures of stepping into his fatherâ€™s shoes as the war in Ukraine impacts his family and staff.
